column1: in memory of gladys pearl navales -- sturtevant funeral home| gladys pearl navales. july 27
column9: 2015. she was a native of portsmouth and retired from maryview hospital as a physical therapy specialists. she was preceded by her husband cesar jose navales
column12: two brothers joseph and michael fedock. she is survived by a son anthony jones and his fiance paula ellis
column18: one brother frank fedock and wife jewell
column19: and a host of loving nieces and nephews. a visitation will be held at a later date
column20: sturtevant funeral home is in charge of arrangements
